title: FE-Design: Finalize responsive breakpoints and component structure for MainLayout
description: Analyze REQ-1-005 and REQ-1-034 to define the specific CSS breakpoints (375px, 768px, 1280px+). Design the component hierarchy for the MainLayout, including AppBar, Drawer, and content area, planning for mobile-first implementation.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: A design document or component plan is created outlining the structure. Breakpoints are defined and documented in the project's theme file.
business_value: Increases user reach, satisfaction, and retention by providing a consistent, high-quality experience on any device.

title: FE-Impl: Develop MainLayout component with responsive structure
description: Implement the MainLayout.tsx component using Material-UI's Grid, AppBar, and Drawer. Implement the basic structure that adapts between mobile (temporary drawer) and desktop (permanent drawer) layouts.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: The component renders without errors. The layout visually shifts between mobile and desktop views when the viewport is resized.
definition_of_done: Component implemented, unit tests passing, code reviewed.
business_value: Increases user reach, satisfaction, and retention by providing a consistent, high-quality experience on any device.

title: FE-Analysis: Select and configure math expression parsing library
description: Evaluate `math.js` or similar libraries against all requirements from REQ-1-001, including support for all scientific functions, custom functions, and robust error handling.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: A library is selected and the choice is documented with justifications. A proof-of-concept demonstrates key calculations.
business_value: Establishes the core, non-negotiable functionality of the calculator.

title: FE-Impl: Create `calculationEngine` service
description: Develop a TypeScript service that wraps the chosen math library. This service will expose a single `evaluate` method that takes the expression string and current angle mode, normalizes output, and handles errors.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: The service correctly evaluates basic arithmetic and scientific functions. The service correctly applies angle mode conversions for all trig functions.
definition_of_done: Service implemented with comprehensive unit tests passing.
business_value: Establishes the core, non-negotiable functionality of the calculator.

title: Infra-Config: Provision and configure AWS Cognito User Pool
description: Write Terraform code to provision the AWS Cognito User Pool and App Client as per REQ-1-029. Configure the password policy (REQ-1-071) and callback URLs.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: `terraform apply` successfully creates the Cognito resources. The password policy in the AWS console matches the requirements.
definition_of_done: Terraform code merged, resources provisioned in dev environment.
business_value: Enables user-specific data persistence, a primary driver for user retention.

title: BE-Impl: Implement JWT authentication guard and strategy
description: In NestJS, implement a Passport.js JWT strategy and a `JwtAuthGuard` to validate JWTs issued by AWS Cognito by fetching the public keys (JWKS) from Cognito's endpoint.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: An API request to a protected endpoint without a token is rejected with 401. An API request with a valid Cognito-issued JWT is allowed.
definition_of_done: Integration tests for the guard pass. Code reviewed by security lead.
business_value: Serves as the gateway to all personalized features.

title: BE-Impl: Create data endpoints for history and variables
description: Implement the NestJS modules, controllers, services, and TypeORM entities for `CalculationHistory` and `UserVariable`. Endpoints must be protected by the JWT guard and scoped to the user.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: API integration tests pass for all CRUD operations on variables and GET/POST on history. An attempt to access another user's data results in a 403/404 error.
definition_of_done: Endpoints implemented, documented, and fully tested.
business_value: Enables persistence of user data, a core feature.

title: BE-Impl: Create CRUD endpoints for Custom Modes
description: Implement the `CustomModes` module in NestJS, including the entity (with JSONB definition), controller, and service. Create authenticated endpoints for full CRUD functionality.
sprint_goal: Deliver a functional, responsive core scientific calculator and all backend infrastructure for auth, user data, and custom modes.
acceptance_criteria: A user can create, read, update, and delete their own custom modes via the API. An attempt to access another user's mode fails with a 403/404 error.
definition_of_done: Endpoints implemented, documented, and fully tested.
business_value: Enables the core user-extensible functionality of the application.

title: FE-Impl: Develop Registration UI component
description: Create the `Register.tsx` React component with Material-UI form fields for email, password, and confirm password. Implement client-side validation for email format, password match, and required fields.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
acceptance_criteria: The registration form renders correctly with all specified fields. Client-side validation provides real-time feedback for invalid inputs.
business_value: Enables user-specific data persistence, a primary driver for user retention.

title: FE-Impl: Integrate Registration UI with AWS Cognito service
description: Wire the `Register.tsx` component to the authentication service. On form submission, call the Cognito `signUp` function. Handle success by automatically logging the user in and redirecting. Handle errors by displaying messages from the API.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
acceptance_criteria: Submitting a valid form creates a user in the Cognito User Pool. The application correctly displays an error message if the email is already in use.
definition_of_done: Integration works and is covered by E2E tests.
business_value: Enables user-specific data persistence, a primary driver for user retention.

title: FE-Impl: Develop Login UI and integrate with Cognito OAuth flow
description: Create the Login.tsx component. Implement the logic to initiate the PKCE flow on button click by redirecting to the Cognito Hosted UI. Create a callback component that handles the return from Cognito and exchanges the code for tokens.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking 'Log In' redirects the user to the Cognito login page. After successful authentication, the user is redirected back to the application and tokens are stored.
definition_of_done: Login flow is fully functional and covered by E2E tests.
business_value: Serves as the gateway to all personalized features.

title: FE-Config: Configure Vite PWA plugin for service worker generation
description: Install and configure the `vite-plugin-pwa` package. Define the caching strategy to cache the application shell and all static assets. Ensure a cache-busting mechanism is in place.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
acceptance_criteria: The Vite build process successfully generates a `sw.js` and a manifest file. The service worker is configured to cache all essential application assets.
definition_of_done: Vite config is merged and build artifacts are verified.
deployment_notes: Can be tricky to debug caching issues.
business_value: Increases application reliability and user trust.

title: BE-Impl: Implement Secure Formula Execution Lambda with isolated-vm
description: Create the AWS Lambda function as per REQ-1-018. The function must use `isolated-vm` to execute user code, be configured with no network/filesystem access and strict resource limits, and expose only allow-listed math functions.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete Custom Mode creation wizard and the secure backend for custom code execution.
acceptance_criteria: The Lambda successfully executes a valid formula. An attempt to execute `process.exit()` fails with a security error. The deployment package does not contain `vm2`.
definition_of_done: Lambda is deployed, extensively tested for security holes, and code reviewed by security lead.
deployment_notes: RISK-002: Sandbox escape vulnerability is the primary concern.
business_value: Actualizes the core value of the user-extensible framework.

title: FE-Impl: Develop the wizard shell and step 1 (Name & Description)
description: Implement the main `CreateModeWizard.tsx` component using Material-UI's Stepper. Implement the first step, a form for the mode's name and description. Include client-side validation for the name field (required).
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete Custom Mode creation wizard and the secure backend for custom code execution.
acceptance_criteria: The wizard UI with a stepper control is rendered. The user can enter a name and description. The 'Next' button is disabled if the name is empty.
definition_of_done: Component implemented and covered by unit/component tests.
business_value: Enables the core user-extensible functionality of the application.

title: FE-Impl: Develop wizard step 3 (Define Formulas) with validation
description: Create the 'Define Formulas' step. Integrate a code editor component. Implement real-time formula validation using a client-side math parser, checking for syntax errors and undefined variables.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete Custom Mode creation wizard and the secure backend for custom code execution.
acceptance_criteria: The formula editor provides syntax highlighting. Typing a syntactically incorrect formula displays a real-time error message. The 'Save' button is disabled if any formula is invalid.
definition_of_done: Component implemented and covered by robust unit tests for the validation logic.
business_value: Enables the core user-extensible functionality of the application.

title: FE-Impl: Develop account deletion UI with confirmation modal
description: In the user settings page, add a 'Delete Account' button. On click, it will show a confirmation modal that requires the user to type their username to enable the final 'Permanently Delete' button.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete Custom Mode creation wizard and the secure backend for custom code execution.
acceptance_criteria: The confirmation modal appears on button click. The final delete button is disabled until the username is correctly entered.
business_value: Ensures compliance with data protection regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and builds user trust.

title: FE-Impl: Develop dynamic UI for launched custom modes
description: Create a `LaunchedModeView.tsx` component that takes a custom mode definition object and dynamically renders a form with all its inputs and outputs. Wire up a 'Calculate' button to call the execution API endpoint.
sprint_goal: Enable users to launch and securely execute their created custom modes, completing the custom mode feature loop.
acceptance_criteria: The component correctly renders all inputs and outputs based on a mode definition. Clicking 'Calculate' sends the correct payload to the `/execute` API.
definition_of_done: Component implemented and integrated, covered by E2E tests.
business_value: Actualizes the core value of the user-extensible framework.

title: FE-Analysis: Design IndexedDB schema and sync state machine
description: Design the schema for the IndexedDB 'sync_queue' object store and a state machine diagram for the sync process: (Offline) -> (Queuing) -> (Reconnected) -> (Syncing) -> [Success/Conflict/Fail].
sprint_goal: Implement the full offline data synchronization mechanism for a resilient user experience.
acceptance_criteria: IndexedDB schema is documented. A state machine diagram is created and reviewed. The plan accounts for retries with exponential backoff on failure.
definition_of_done: Design document is peer-reviewed and approved by the team.
deployment_notes: RISK-001: Offline sync data loss is the primary risk this design must mitigate.
business_value: Increases user trust, data integrity, and application reliability.

title: FE-Impl: Develop background synchronization and conflict resolution logic
description: Implement the logic that listens for the 'online' event. When triggered, it reads from the IndexedDB queue and sends requests to the backend, handling success, failure (with retry), and 409 conflicts.
sprint_goal: Implement the full offline data synchronization mechanism for a resilient user experience.
acceptance_criteria: Upon reconnection, a network request is made for each item in the sync queue. Successful requests result in items being deleted from IndexedDB. A 409 Conflict response triggers a refresh of local data.
definition_of_done: Logic is implemented and covered by extensive E2E testing.
deployment_notes: RISK-001: This is the most complex part of the offline feature.
business_value: Increases user trust, data integrity, and application reliability.
